original_text: I will even give them into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of them that seek their life: and their dead bodies shall be for meat unto the fowls of the heaven, and to the beasts of the earth.
korean_text: 내가 그들의 원수의 손과 그들의 생명을 찾는 자의 손에 넘기리니 그들의 시체가 공중의 새와 땅의 짐승의 먹이가 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: into the hand of their enemies
and into the hand of them
and their dead bodies shall be
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 죽은 시체는 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: for meat unto the fowls of the heaven
and to the beasts of the earth
